item.title: 个人简介
item.description: Xingjie Shi (史兴杰), Associate Professor Academy of Statistics and Interdisciplinary Sciences East China Normal University ISI Elected member 现场统计研究会环境与资源统计学会理事 研究方向：组学遗传学数据融合、高维大数据统计计算 Email: shixingjie0615@gmail.com div.blue { background-color:#E3AF63;
